TopicTitle: 9/9/2014 Find All The Eggs!!! - Egghunting Marathon

Articles.Content:
On The 9th of September at 12PM PDT I will Endeavour to, with the help of Infinite Fuel and Hyperedit, Find all the Eggs!!!

In the entire game, from memory, in one consecutive livestream.

I Estimate it will take me about 6 hours.

I have spent over a year live streaming The EggHunting Series and it has finally come to an end. I Have Found All Of The Eggs!

As a Sendoff to the series i thought it nice to make the (.21.1-.23.5) save file available and do a speed run in .24 ending with the one that wasn't listed; MoHole.

I Hope you Can Join me for this momentous occasion.

http://www.twitch.tv/grim187plays

EgghuntingSave.rar
